item.title: Preliminary Interview Template
item.description: This document is used as a reference when conducting interviews with the UNICEF Innovation Fund cohorts. The interviews help us collect background and context for each teamâ€™s experience and familiarity with open source and participating in open source communities. This template provides some structure and guidance on what questions to ask and understand about each team. Current situation This section helps us understand where each team is at the moment.
